0.user_question: Marcell and Beatrice are having a contest to see who can eat the most fruit roll-ups, so they unroll as many as they can find. ost_step.3: Add the number of roll-ups they have together. They have (24 + 14) = 38 roll-ups in total.

direct_answer.text: Let's think step by step. Marcell has 24 roll-ups while Beatrice has 12. They both have 38 roll-ups. They ate 38 roll-ups in total. So the answer is: 38.
